chat_history.message:
Hello,
My Galaxy S21 5G has a problem:
Well, 
I bought it a few months ago. The thing is that I've been carrying it for weeks and every time I connect it to the charger, it turns off and on several times during charging.
What can I do?
Thanks,

Hello Cristina: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose the location that is most convenient for you to send your package. You can find a list of delivery points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do Return Preparation: 1. Check the instructions on how to return a product. 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your item. 3. Remove any protective cover or screen protector that it has. 4. Pack the item and its accessories following these guidelines. Packing of the Item: • The box must be strong and resistant. You should place the item inside the box securely so that it doesn't move during transport. • Stick the return label on the top of the box (you can also add an additional label inside to help identify the shipment in case the original label peels off or gets damaged). • Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case the item is damaged during transport. Your return is ready for shipping! We'll let you know when it arrives. Best regards, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
